name: Emily's Strawberry Balsamic Salad
author: Cincy Emily
summary: This sweet, tangy salad has lots of plate appeal with its colorful ingredients. Make the dressing in advance if you choose.
ingredients: 1 head red lettuce leaves, rinsed, dried, and torn
½ small red onion, peeled, cut into 1/2-inch-wide slivers
¼ cup sliced almonds, lightly toasted
1 pint fresh strawberries, rinsed and sliced
directions: To make the dressing, place the balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, shallot, garlic, salt, and pepper in the bowl of a mini food processor
Slowly pour in the olive oil, and pulse again until thoroughly blended
Set aside or refrigerate until needed
Divide lettuce between 6 serving plates, and top with red onion, almonds, strawberries, and feta cheese
